attributes.action: Support  A State Funeral For Jeremy Clarkson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Support A State Funeral For Jeremy Clarkson

As a National Treasure Top Gears Jeremy Claskson should be given a State Funeral… (when he dies). His ethics and policies are outstanding, he’s a true British citizen who loves this country and is perhaps the only entertaining person on TV. Plus this may be my only chance to get tickets to the Top Gear show

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
